options.content:
# Condition to be checked 

Following indicators provide information about risk that scheduler could not place pods on node

    OutOfDisk 
    Ready (node is ready to accept pods) / replaced by unchedulable, unavailable
    MemoryPressure (node memory is too low)
    PIDPressure (too many running processes)
    DiskPressure (remaining disk capacity is too low)
    NetworkUnavailable

targets.expr: sum (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/", node=~"$node_selected", node=~"$node_filter"}[10m])) by (node) / sum (machine_cpu_cores{node=~"$node_selected", node=~"$node_filter"}) by (node) *100
sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{id="/",node=~"$node_selected", node=~"$node_filter"}) by (node) / sum (machine_memory_bytes{node=~"$node_selected", node=~"$node_filter"}) by (node) * 100

sum (container_fs_usage_bytes{device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/",node=~"$node_selected", node=~"$node_filter"}) by (node) / sum (container_fs_limit_bytes{device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/",node=~"$node_selected", node=~"$node_filter"}) by (node) * 100

panels.title: POD present on node @ the end of time range
Process present on node @ the end of time range

alert.name: INFRASTRUCTURE / Node filesystem usage percentage alert
